name: National Cyber Security Centre Finland
purpose: Report cybersecurity incidents and receive guidance
whenToUse: For reporting cyber incidents, data breaches, or seeking cybersecurity guidance

name: Police Emergency Line
whenToUse: Active cyberattacks, cybercrime in progress, urgent threats

name: Data Protection Ombudsman
whenToUse: Personal data breaches, GDPR violations, privacy concerns

name: Financial Supervisory Authority
whenToUse: Banking fraud, investment scams, financial cyber incidents
